metadata.name: RISE
metadata.description:
The Hales and Hunter Grainery in Riverdale IL, USA was constructed and established operations in the early 1900s. Production operations ceased half a century later and the facility sat idle, abandoned and in a state of disrepair for decades. Then in 2015 the entire complex was demolished and cleared to a barren field. Now intangible, the Grainery comes back to life in imagery and sound. Using a base image of the grainery from 2014 by TRENT NORTH, a signature animated 3D sculpture by EOIN and thematic music composed by GENZO, this 1/1 digital artwork, RISE is minted on the blockchain for future generations to enjoy. 

License: The NFT owner has unlimited right to personal use, public display and publication with credit to the creators. Commercial distribution, commercial merchandise and derivative works by permission only. The creators retain copyright.
